about_the_game:
A hard-boiled private eye finds herself stranded in a forgotten corner of New Mexico after following a mysterious paranormal lead. All seems lost until the case finds her instead - and once the truth is revealed, there's nothing holding back the lusty desires of the dead.

Deathblossom is an action / kinetic novel hybrid about love and mortality. Enjoy visual novel-style written scenes and high-octane top-down action as you shoot, kick and blast your way through an erotic revenge thriller!

In Deathblossom, get ready to:

  • Experience a fully illustrated story by Zoquete

  • Reach a variety of lewd scenes with different situations, noncon and occasional bondage

  • Enjoy custom SFX mixed with the help of the OpenNSFW project

  • Wield your revolver and kick some undead ass in bullet time with challenging but accessible action gameplay

  • Explore a supernatural Western noir setting with existential themes

  • Meet a colorful cast of period-inspired characters

And don't forget the spectacular soundtrack by the underground musicians of Newgrounds: featuring Creo, Tanger, JamesHeart, Demonicity, AriaLowo, the Lemons, and many more amazing artists!

There's no going back from a deal with Death itself.

If you enjoyed this free project and want to get some behind-the-scenes content, consider buying the supporter pack, available as DLC on Steam! This is an optional way to support the solo developer if you want to see more fun, unique NSFW projects in the future. Thank you for your support and enjoy the game!

content_descriptors.notes: This game features violence, depictions of non-consensual sex, furry and intersex characters, and mature themes.

legal_notice: Credit and license information is included in the "Credits + License" folder packaged with the game installation.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Deathblossom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (32-bit or 64-bit x86).
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
